Text.Page:
Can you find my brother? He left a few days ago to get some materials for the shop, but I haven't seen him since. His name's Pattek.

More and more villagers are getting kidnapped, and I just...

Can you go look for him for me?
(One old box has "Pattek" inscribed on it. Footprints around the box lead toward Tenebrous Mines.)
I can't...there's not enough information. I don't know what happened.
